mapper.select: SELECT uo.id, uo.contract_partner_name as company, ro.delivery_address, ro.processor, ro.processor_phone, ro.site_name as pickupAddress FROM user_order uo LEFT JOIN recycle_order ro ON uo.id = ro.parent_id AND ro.type = 'purchase' WHERE uo.stage = 'transport' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM recycle_order ro WHERE ro.parent_id = uo.id AND ro.type = 'transport' ) ORDER BY uo.create_time DESC

SELECT uo.id, uo.no, uo.contract_partner_name AS company, transportOrder.site_name AS pickupAddress, transportOrder.delivery_address AS deliveryAddress, transportOrder.processor AS contactName, transportOrder.processor_phone AS contactPhone FROM user_order uo LEFT JOIN recycle_order transportOrder ON transportOrder.parent_id = uo.id AND transportOrder.type = 'transport' WHERE uo.stage = 'processing' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM recycle_order ro WHERE ro.parent_id = uo.id AND ro.type = 'processing' ) ORDER BY uo.create_time DESC
